section.p: List of function calls with format "<component>.<function>":
This sample demonstrates how to generate sequence diagrams from DITA content. In this particular case the data for the diagram comes from the same section where the XSLT-Conref is placed in:

li.p: The first codeph element within the first p element is taken as calling component name.

ul.li: All codeph elements within the first sl element are taken as function calls with the format "<component-name>.<function-name>".

li.p: The data comes from semantically specialized DITA content. For instance, the workflow of a component contains the functions calls with specialized elements.
There is a dedicated section to specify the required data only for generating the sequence diagram. The data is only visible in Oxygen and will be hidden in the output.
